org.corfudb.runtime.smr

Interface ITransaction<R>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeferredTransaction, PassthroughTransaction

    public interface ITransaction<R>
    Created by mwei on 5/3/15.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default R execute() 
      CompletableFuture<R> executeAsync() 
      R executeTransaction(ISMREngine engine)
      Execute this command on a specific SMR engine.
      ISMREngine getEngine(UUID streamID, Class<?> objClass)
      Returns an SMR engine for a transactional context.
      ICorfuDBInstance getInstance()
      return a pointer to the runtime managing this transaction.
      ITransactionCommand getTransaction()
      Returns the transaction command.
      ITimestamp propose()
      Propose to the SMR engine(s) for the transaction to be executed.
      void setInstance(ICorfuDBInstance instance)
      Set the CorfuDB instance for this transaction.
      default void setTimestamp(ITimestamp timestamp) 
      void setTransaction(ITransactionCommand<R> transaction)
      Set the command to be executed for this transaction.

    • Method Detail

      • getEngine

        ISMREngine getEngine(UUID streamID,
                     Class<?> objClass)
        Returns an SMR engine for a transactional context.
        Parameters:
        streamID - The streamID the SMR engine should run on.
        objClass - The class that the SMR engine runs against.
        Returns:
        The SMR engine to be used for a transactional context.

      • setInstance

        void setInstance(ICorfuDBInstance instance)
        Set the CorfuDB instance for this transaction. Used during deserialization.
        Parameters:
        instance - The CorfuDB instance used for this tx.

      • getInstance

        ICorfuDBInstance getInstance()
        return a pointer to the runtime managing this transaction. this is needed for transactions on objects which may create new objects during that transaction.
        Returns:
        the runtime

      • setTransaction

        void setTransaction(ITransactionCommand<R> transaction)
        Set the command to be executed for this transaction.
        Parameters:
        transaction - The command(s) to be executed for this transaction.

      • executeTransaction

        R executeTransaction(ISMREngine engine)
        Execute this command on a specific SMR engine.
        Parameters:
        engine - The SMR engine to run this command on.

      • getTransaction

        ITransactionCommand getTransaction()
        Returns the transaction command.
        Returns:
        The command(s) to be executed for this transaction.

      • setTimestamp

        default void setTimestamp(ITimestamp timestamp)

      • propose

        ITimestamp propose()
            throws IOException
        Propose to the SMR engine(s) for the transaction to be executed.
        Returns:
        The timestamp that the transaction was proposed at. This timestamp should be a valid timestamp for all streams that the transaction belongs to, otherwise, the transaction will abort.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • execute

        default R execute()
           throws TransactionAbortedException
        Throws:
        TransactionAbortedException

      • executeAsync

        CompletableFuture<R> executeAsync()
